header.startPointForDistance: Set starting point for distance measurements

footer.thisActionCannotBeUndone: This action cannot be undone. It will permanently delete your account and remove data from our servers.

main.collectDescription: Search breathtaking villas from around the world and save those that spark your imagination. Create a personal collection that reflects your unique taste.
main.saveWithEmailDescription: Simply sign up with your email address to create a collection and access it from anywhere.
main.shareCollectionDescription: Create a shareable link to share your collection with family and friends.

hero.tagline: Find the place where you truly belong. Villaya helps you collect, compare and discover homes that feel right.

house.compareDescription: Compare the selected properties based on key attributes such as price, size, year built and more. The best option in each category is highlighted to help with decision making.
house.descriptionDescription: Enter a detailed description of the property, including its features, advantages and special characteristics.
house.yearDescription: Enter the property's year of construction to inform potential buyers or renters about the building's age.
house.contactDescription: Which agency/agent is offering the property?
house.rankDescription: Rate the property based on your interest or preference.

common.noListingsFound: You haven't saved any dream homes yet. Search for your personal dream home and save the information here.
common.foundAPropertyPrompt: Found a property? Add it quickly

input.pleaseEnterFeatures: Please enter the property's features. Use the input field (comma-separated) or the list below.
input.youCanAddImage: You can add the image here via a URL or from the clipboard. A copy will be stored internally.
input.alternativeImage: Alternatively, you can paste an image from the clipboard.
input.pleaseEnterPropertyUrl: You can enter the property URL here.
input.pleaseEnterLocation: Please enter the property's location. Provide an approximate address or coordinates in the form Latitude,Longitude. Nearby amenities will also be attempted to be found.
input.rankDescription: Choose how you rate the property here.
input.sizeDescription: Enter the living area or usable area in m² here. The price per square meter will be calculated automatically.
input.priceSqm: The price per square meter is {price} EUR.
input.codeError: Property information could not be retrieved.
input.sourcecodeDescription: You can paste the HTML source code of the property page here. Currently, extraction works only for idealista and thinkspain.
